entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 6:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 16 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22 except minus 16 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:04 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16 except minus 12 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16 except minus 12 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:04 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 except minus 18 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24 except minus 18 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:04 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 16. Forecast issued 6:04 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
